title: World-Altering Shocker: Why Government Can't Ever "Shut Down"
text:
By Christopher Watson
Tuesday, January 23, 2018 5:44
 
I covered the women’s march yesterday…but a couple more things need to be examined when we look at protests and marches.  With hundreds of thousands of women, men and children marching, the countless signs waving in a sea of people and the seemingly endless chats, when you listen to the interviews of the march participants the main threadline of thought was equal rights, empowerment for women, a dissatisfaction with government, specifically the current administration, and the overall mantra of any march or protest: “we just want our voices to be heard.

Must say, for all the lying crap website BIN is, there is also monumental “fake news” and deception in the MSM, that is, at least this government shutdown ruse. Press people that know Washington all know this and willfully contribute to the fiscal responsibility fakery.
For your information, the facts: politicians will continue to deficit spend like drunken sailors, will always raise the debt ceiling. Congress will not ever actually implement any meaningful fiscal responsibility, again, we’re talking corrupt, drunken sailors.
The myth: Congress is concerned about the debt, is doing something about it.
Government shutdowns are all fake dog and pony shows, to create a pretense that government is financially responsible. Congress is merely play acting so that you don’t see them as the irresponsible drunken sailors they really are, who’ve gone way beyond running up all their credit cards to the limit. The whole fiscal crisis is fakery, in terms of “we’re so disturbed by the debt” that always, I mean always, ends in ever more of the same, moving forward. (Think about this, can you imagine real people, who’ve run all their credit cards to the limit, simply be allowed to raise their credit limits and continue the spending spree? You’d say, “That’s a ridiculous, stupid idea!”, right?)
Why do they do this? To try and create some confidence in them they’re responsible, smoke and mirrors. They can’t have all the dumbed-down public fully aware the patients have taken over the asylum. The truth would only breed contempt for government and doubts as to the future of the economy and the dollar, the currency, itself, a confidence game, since dollars are, actually, just paper or computer blips of no real intrinsic value, except for what you can con people into believing they’re worth. Of course, they’re actually worth so much less, if people were to wakeup to how huge the deficit numbers are, as they print ever more money out of nothing, to fund the drunken sailors, as we speak.
It does seem to work, how Congress puts on their big boy pants, long enough to make some headlines, that is, before getting back to business as usual, every time.
